code: @Test public void testSftpChmod() throws Exception {     if (!canTest()) {         return.     }     // see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SSHD-267     if (isJava16()) {         return.     }     template.sendBodyAndHeader("sftp://localhost:" + getPort() + "/" + FTP_ROOT_DIR + "?username=admin&password=admin&chmod=777", "Hello World", Exchange.FILE_NAME, "hello.txt").     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/hello.txt").     assertTrue("File should exist: " + file, file.exists()).     assertEquals("Hello World", context.getTypeConverter().convertTo(String.class, file)). }
